autorenew_enterprise_cloud_database_clos: Your request to close the Enterprise Cloud Database has been processed. You have been sent an email detailing the procedure to follow.
An error has occurred requesting to close your Enterprise Cloud Database:
Deleting an Enterprise Cloud Database will permanently erase all corresponding data. The process of deleting an Enterprise Cloud Database does not entitle you to a refund.
You will get an email containing the procedure to close your Enterprise Cloud Database, so you can confirm that you want it deleted immediately.
